tracks.text:
First slide of the presentation

 - Up and down cursor will move/skip to the next slide

 - Escape will interrupt a slide and wait

 - When waiting Escape will restart or return to the higher level presentation

At the end of a video or audio track Pi presents will wait.

Hint: Use Powerpoint to prepare slides, export as .jpg
tracks.title: First

tracks.text:
Slides can be:
  - images
  - videos
  - audio tracks
  - messages
tracks.title: Slides
